name: Meaninglesss
description:
This is the first game I publish. Likely failed my semester making this, but I had fun and I learned some stuff. Hope you enjoy it!

Here is a link to play it on browser:  https://simmer.io/@Yee_Man/meaningless

Music: Composer: 

https://www.youtube.com/@extrinity

Soundtrack:

https://youtu.be/1H6ccHJp1rk

Game: Premise:

Blades becomes blunt as their edges get chipped away 

They lose their sharpness when they are used

Words lose their impact when they are spoken 

As they are used, they become meaningless

Controls:
  • The blue power is a wall jump: quickly press space twice 
  • The purple one is a dash: press shift while looking in the direction you want to go 
  • The yellow one is a charged jump: hold down space then release (you can do it while airborne) 
  • You can shoot with right click (you can do a charged shot)
  • You can swing your sword with left click
